description: Numbers whose sum of digits is 6.
comments: A007953(a(n)) = 6; number of repdigits = #{6,33,222,111111} = A242627(6) = 4. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 17 2014
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..924
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..1500] | &+Intseq(n) eq 6 ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 07 2013(Haskell)a052220 n = a052220_list !! (n-1)a052220_list = filter ((== 6) . a007953) [0..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 17 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 01 2000
